org.apache.reef.io.network.impl

Interface StreamingCodec<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Codec<T>, Decoder<T>, Encoder<T>

    public interface StreamingCodec<T>
extends Codec<T>
    A codec that can make serialization more efficient when an object has to be codec'ed through a chain of codecs
